```{r cherrypick}
cherrypick <- file.path(
    "http://worminfo.steinbaugh.com",
    "cherrypick.xlsx") %>%
    readFileByExtension() %>%
    mutate(clone = paste0(
        library,
        plateNum,
        plateRow,
        str_pad(plateCol, 2, pad = "0"))
    ) %>%
    filter(!is.na(sequence)) %>%
    select(clone, sequence) %>%
    arrange(clone) %>%
    left_join(geneIDs[, c("gene", "sequence")], by = "sequence")
glimpse(cherrypick)
saveData(cherrypick, dir = dataDir, compress = compress)
```
